bookBuilder.title: Kwinjiza BookBuilder

upload.title: Kuraguza inyandiko zawe
upload.dragDrop: Kurura no gushira dosiye ya ZIP hano
upload.orClick: canke ukande kugira ngo ushakishe amadosiye
upload.supportedFormats: Byemewe: Amadosiye ya ZIP arimo inyandiko za Word (.docx)

messages.importTip: üìù Inama yo Kwinjiza: Niba inyandiko zawe za Word zirimo ibintu bivanze (imitwe, urutonde rw'ibiri, amakuru y'umwanditsi, n'ibindi), BookBuilder ishobora gukora ibice byongeyeho. Nyuma yo kwinjiza, urashobora gusiba byoroshye ibice udashaka no kwimura ibiri hagati y'Intangiriro, Igice Gikomeye, n'Iherezo nk'uko bikenewe.
messages.systemPages: Urupapuro rw'Umutwe n'Uburenganzira byakozwe ku buryo bwikora - urupapuro rwose rw'umutwe/uburenganzira rwinjijwe rwaretswe.
messages.languageNote: Inyandiko zizashyirwa mu byiciro hakoreshejwe imiterere y'ururimi {{language}}.
messages.noContent: Nta bice by'ibiri byabonetse - nyamuneka suzuma dosiye yawe ya ZIP.
messages.processingError: Ikosa mu gutegura dosiye ya ZIP. Nyamuneka suzuma uburyo bw'idosiye ugerageze ukundi.
messages.emptyZip: Dosiye ya ZIP isa nkaho ari ubusa cyangwa idafite inyandiko zemewe.
messages.invalidFormat: Uburyo bw'idosiye si bwo. Nyamuneka kuraguza dosiye ya ZIP irimo inyandiko za Word.

classification.title: Gusuzuma Icyiciro cy'Inyandiko
classification.subtitle: Kurura ibice hagati y'ibyiciro kugira ngo utegure imiterere y'igitabo cyawe
classification.noSections: Nta bice biri muri iki cyiciro
classification.frontMatterDesc: Urupapuro rw'umutwe, uburenganzira bw'umwanditsi, kwicuza, intangiriro, urutonde rw'ibiri
classification.backMatterDesc: Umwanzuro, ijambo ry'imperuka, inyongera, inkoranya y'amagambo, urutonde, indango

validation.noFile: Nyamuneka hitamo dosiye ya ZIP yo kuraguza.
validation.invalidFile: Nyamuneka hitamo dosiye ya ZIP yemewe.
validation.fileTooLarge: Dosiye ni nini cyane. Ubunini bwikuze ni 50MB.
validation.noDocuments: Nta nyandiko za Word zabonetse muri dosiye ya ZIP.
validation.processingFailed: Byanze gutegura inyandiko. Nyamuneka suzuma uburyo bw'idosiye.

bookBuilder.dragToReorder: Kurura ibice kugira ngo ubisubiremo mu byiciro cyangwa ukoreshe menu ya "KWIMURA" kugira ngo uhindure ibice hagati y'Intangiriro/Igice Gikomeye/Iherezo
